original_text: But Jesus still did not reply to what the men were saying against him. Pilate was very surprised about that.
korean_text: 예수께서 다시 아무 말씀으로도 대답하지 아니하시니 빌라도가 놀랍게 여기더라

sentences.original_text: But Jesus still did not reply
to what the men were saying against him
Pilate was very surprised about that
